casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Ray MUHAMMAD 171P18-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. July 20, 2018 Aaron Thomas Johnson, Assistant Appellate Defender, Ray Muhammad, George Ligon, Jr., Attorney at Law, for Muhammad, Ray. Glenn Gerding, Appellate Defender, for State. Alesia Mikhaulauna Balshakova, Assistant Attorney General, for State of North Carolina N. Lorrin Freeman, District Attorney, for State. The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 19th of July 2018 by Defendant for Temporary Stay: "Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 20th of July 2018." Morgan, J. recused
